Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing

Class AutoBuiltForm<T>

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.AutoBuiltForm<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModuleExporter, Localizer.LocaleChangeListener, JComponentMonitor, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class AutoBuiltForm<T>
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Localizer.LocaleChangeListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable, JComponentMonitor, ModuleExporter

This class is a simplest for builder for any class. It supports the FormManager interface to process user actions in the generated form.

Form was build has two columns:

  • field label
  • field to input content

If number of fields in the form is too long, you can split form to a set of two-column pairs (named bars). Fields of the class to show must be annotated at least with LocaleResource annotations. These annotations are source for the field labels and field tooltips in the form to build. Form can also contains a set of buttons to process actions on it. These buttons are not represents as fields in the class to show, but as Action annotation before class description. Any user actions on the form fire FieldFormManager.onField(Object, Object, String, Object) or ActionFormManager.onAction(Object, Object, String, Object) calls on the FormManager interface. To simplify code, it's recommended that class to show also implements FormManager interface itself.

Form built doesn't contain any predefined buttons ("OK", "Cancel" and similar). You must close this form yourself, if required

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
Serialized Form
LastUpdate:
0.0.4

    • AutoBuiltForm

      public AutoBuiltForm​(ContentMetadataInterface mdi, Localizer localizer, LoggerFacade logger, java.net.URL leftIcon, T instance, FormManager<java.lang.Object,​T> formMgr, int numberOfBars, boolean tooltipsOnFocus) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, SyntaxException, LocalizationException, ContentException

      Constructor of the class

      Parameters:
      mdi - metadata for the instance will be showed
      localizer - localizer associated with the given instance
      logger - logger to get diagnostics while form is built. Defaults use current logger of the PureLibSettings class.
      leftIcon - icon will be shown on the left of the form built
      instance - instance to show
      formMgr - form manager for the instance. It's strongly recommended for instance to implement this interface self
      numberOfBars - number of bars in the form
      tooltipsOnFocus - true if tooltips require in the state string when field gets focus
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - any arguments are null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - any errors in arguments
      SyntaxException - errors in class or fields annotations
      LocalizationException - errors in localizer
      ContentException - errors in class or fields annotations

    • ask

      public static boolean ask​(java.awt.Dialog window, Localizer localizer, AutoBuiltForm<?> form) throws LocalizationException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Create dialog with the form

      Parameters:
      window - parent window of the dialog
      localizer - localizer to use with the dialog
      form - form built
      Returns:
      true if the 'OK' was pressed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      LocalizationException - on any localization problems
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on any parameter's problems

    • ask

      public static boolean ask​(java.awt.Dialog window, Localizer localizer, AutoBuiltForm<?> form, java.net.URI[] okAndCancel) throws LocalizationException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Create dialog with the form

      Parameters:
      window - parent window of the dialog
      localizer - localizer to use with the dialog
      form - form built
      okAndCancel - application paths of the form buttons to use as 'OK' and 'Cancel'. Can be empty array (means don't use), array[1] (means use 'Cancel'), and array[2](means use 'OK' and 'Cancel');
      Returns:
      true if the 'OK' was pressed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      LocalizationException - on any localization problems
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on any parameter's problems

    • ask

      public static boolean ask​(java.awt.Frame window, Localizer localizer, AutoBuiltForm<?> form, java.net.URI[] okAndCancel) throws LocalizationException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Parameters:

      form - form built
      okAndCancel - application paths of the form buttons to use as 'OK' and 'Cancel'. Can be empty array (means don't use), array[1] (means use 'Cancel'), and array[2](means use 'OK' and 'Cancel');

      true if the 'OK' was pressed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      LocalizationException - on any localization problems
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - on any parameter's problems
